short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An adorable Scottish Fold cat with large amber eyes, peering out from a soft, cozy background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This adorable cat, with its large amber eyes, peeks out from a soft, muted background, exuding curiosity and playfulness. The image's gentle, neutral tones evoke a sense of calm and warmth, perfect for users who appreciate the soothing presence of animals. Whether you're working or casually browsing, this extension adds a touch of comfort and relaxation to your screen, creating a peaceful atmosphere in every tab.
